question_text: If 4x + 9 = 25, what is the value of x?
If 3x + y = 19 and 2x - y = 6, what is the value of x?
What is the vertex of the parabola y = 3(x - 1)² + 7?
A line passes through the points (-1, 4) and (3, 12). What is the equation of this line in slope-intercept form?
If 25% of a number is 18, what is the number?
If g(x) = x² - 2x + 5, what is g(-2)?
What is the area of a rectangle with length 12 units and width 7 units?
The mean of six numbers is 16. If five of the numbers are 10, 12, 18, 20, and 22, what is the sixth number?
If 5^(x-2) = 125, what is the value of x?
A car travels the first 100 miles at 50 mph and the next 150 miles at 60 mph. What is the average speed for the entire trip?
In a right triangle, if one angle measures 40°, what is the measure of the third angle?
What is the value of |−15| + |7| - |3|?
In an arithmetic sequence, the first term is 3 and the common difference is 6. What is the 7th term?
A deck of cards contains 4 aces and 48 other cards. If two cards are drawn without replacement, what is the probability that both are aces? Give answer as a fraction.
What is the distance between the points (1, 8) and (5, 2)?
Solve for x: 5x - 3 ≤ 17
If the ratio of teachers to students in a school is 1:15, and there are 450 students, how many teachers are there?
For which value of k does the equation x² + 10x + k = 0 have exactly one solution?
A sphere has a radius of 6 units. What is its volume? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
What is the x-intercept of the line 4x - 3y = 24?
What is the median of the dataset: 4, 8, 12, 16, 20, 24, 28?
A store offers a 30% discount on all items. If the discounted price of a book is $21, what was the original price?
If f(x) = 3x - 2, what is f(f(4))?
What is the perimeter of a square with side length 9 units?
If a bacteria culture quadruples every 3 hours, what is the growth factor per hour? Round to the nearest hundredth.

5x + 2y = 10
10x + 4y = c
What is the slope of the line perpendicular to the line y = 3/4x - 2?
In a circle with radius 10 units, what is the area of a sector with a central angle of 45°? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
If you roll two dice, what is the probability of getting a sum of 7?
What are the solutions to the equation x² - 8x + 15 = 0?
A recipe calls for 2/3 cup of oil to make 15 muffins. How many cups of oil are needed to make 25 muffins?
In a normal distribution with mean 60 and standard deviation 12, approximately what percentage of data falls within two standard deviations of the mean?
A triangle has sides of length 9, 12, and 15 units. What type of triangle is this?
If h(x) = 2x + 3, what is h(6)?
What is the y-intercept of the line 3x + 5y = 30?
An investment increases by 15% in the first year and decreases by 10% in the second year. What is the overall percentage change? Round to the nearest tenth.
What is the equation of the circle with center (4, -1) and radius 6?
What is the volume of a cone with radius 4 units and height 9 units? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
Solve the compound inequality: -3 ≤ 2x + 1 ≤ 7
In a geometric sequence, the first term is 4 and the common ratio is 1.5. What is the sum of the first 5 terms?
If 6 pencils cost $4.50, how much do 10 pencils cost?
If f(x) = x² + x - 6 and g(x) = x + 2, what is f(g(-1))?
Solve for x: |4x - 12| = 16
What is the midpoint of the line segment connecting (3, 7) and (9, 13)?
